title: Lee Sin lore......
body: Read his lore, It is super outdated. Ionia lore rework anybody?

replies.body:
Yeah,{{champion:64}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:25}} etc.all have super outdated lore that still isn't fixed.

I think Jaredan mentioned that they actually have some people working on champs who are directly tied to the IoW,but I'm not sure if I'm not misremembering that.

You're not misremembering. They're all getting rewrites, but some will have edits initially if that's all they need to make sense without the IoW. Some of our Champs have old bios that essentially have an origin story and "Then they went to the Institute of War," which is easy to remedy. Others, such as those you mention, have backgrounds that are much more difficult to extricate. They will get rewrites out of the gate.
When you get to Cho, please, please don't just make him some mindless brute. His old lore implied that he was highly intelligent and malevolent and I'd like him to keep that.
Seems like you guys are pretty understaffed
Pretty curious what backstory you guys have in mind for {{champion:56}} He is quite an interesting character to write a lore for C:
